scripts.authenticate: node --env-file=.env -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const username = process.env.GITHUB_USERNAME; const token = process.env.CITZ_IMB_IMAGE_PULL_TOKEN; execSync(`echo ${token} | podman login ghcr.io -u ${username} --password-stdin`, { stdio: 'inherit' }); execSync(`echo ${token} | docker login ghcr.io -u ${username} --password-stdin`, { stdio: 'inherit' });"
scripts.up: npm run authenticate && podman compose up -d
scripts.prune: podman compose down --rmi all --volumes && npm run clear-podman-cache
scripts.prune:api: podman rm -f citz-grs-dats-express-api && podman rmi citz-grs-dats-express-api && npm run clear-docker-cache
scripts.rebuild: npm run prune && npm run up -- --force-recreate
scripts.rebuild:api: npm run prune:api && npm run up -- express-api
